translations: 廉价出售；较便宜的工资工作；从下边削球；削弱；根除
底切；牛腰部下侧嫩肉；砍口；切球

sentences.sentence: We were able to undercut our European rivals by 5%.
sentences.translation: 我们能以低于我们的欧洲对手5%的价格出售。

sentences.sentence: Subsidies allow growers to undercut competitors and depress world prices.
sentences.translation: 补贴使得种植者能以低于竞争对手的价格出售并压低世界价格。

sentences.sentence: Some members of the board were trying to undercut the chairman's authority.
sentences.translation: 委员会的某些成员试图削弱主席的权力。
